titles.title: Technology Helps Revamp, Evaluate, and Expedite Designs Act of 2011
THREE-D Act of 2011
To amend title 23, United States Code, to encourage the use of advanced technologies with respect to transportation projects that receive Federal funding, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.
